game_description: Game reveals the mechanics of anxiety comodification. The goal of the game is to set up the production of anxiety. In this fantasy game you will visit the worlds - the underground, the universe and the celestial land of Utopia.
review_2: Gameplay video here (remove the space before "be"): https://youtu. be/jYQlCB9XS7Q Crazy, crazy game! If you can work out how to progress then you're smarter (nuttier?) than me!!
